anya-e0105n22:1_0: Kasmā pana te taṁ āyāciṁsūti? Vuccate, mahāvihāravāsino hi āditoyeva paṭṭhāya piṭakattayaṁ
anya-e0105n22:1_1: yathā tīsu saṅgītīsu pāḷibhāsāya saṅgītaṁ, yathā ca vaṭṭagāmaṇirājakāle (455-467-bu-va)
anya-e0105n22:1_2: potthakesu āropitaṁ, tathā porāṇaṁ pāḷipiṭakameva uggaṇhanti ceva vācenti ca, na
anya-e0105n22:1_3: sakkatāropitapiṭakaṁ. Aṭṭhakathāyo ca tivassasatamattato pure katā. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0105n22:1_4: vasabharājakālato (609-653-bu-0) pacchā sīhaḷikattherānañceva aññesañca vatthu na
anya-e0105n22:1_5: dissati ṭhapetvā mahāsenarājavatthuṁ pārā. aṭṭha. 2.236-237, yāva ācariyabuddhaghosakālāpi
anya-e0105n22:1_6: ca tā eva porāṇaṭṭhakathāyo atthi na abhinavīkatā. Tena tesaṁ piṭakesu yebhuyyena
anya-e0105n22:1_7: janā paricayaṁ kātuṁ asañjātābhilāsā honti asañjātussāhā. Dīpantaresu ca attano piṭakaṁ
anya-e0105n22:1_8: pattharāpetuṁ na sakkonti aṭṭhakathānaṁ dīpabhāsāya abhisaṅkhatattā. Abhayagirivāsino
anya-e0105n22:1_10: mahāyānapiṭakampi navaṁ navaṁ pariyāpuṇanti ceva vācenti ca, tena tesaṁ piṭakesu
anya-e0105n22:1_11: yebhuyyena janā paricayaṁ kātuṁ sañjātābhilāsā honti sañjātussāhā, navaṁ navameva
anya-e0105n22:1_12: hi sattā piyāyanti. Tatoyeva te dīpantaresupi attano vādaṁ pattharāpetuṁ sakkonti.
anya-e0105n22:1_13: Tasmā te mahāvihāravāsino therā attano sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo pāḷibhāsāya abhisaṅkharitukāmā
anya-e0105n22:1_14: tathā kātuṁ samatthaṁ ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa ñāṇappabhāvavisesaṁ yathāvuttaguṇasampannabhāvañca
